verses.verse: Now the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H7650>sworn<s%> in <S%H4709>Mizpeh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> There shall not <S%H376>any<s%> of us <S%H5414>give<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> to <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> to <S%H802>wife.<s%>

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H1008>house<s%> of <S%H1008>God,<s%> and <S%H3427>stayed<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> <S%H6153>even<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up their <S%H6963>voices,<s%> and <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H1065>sore;<s%>

And <S%H559>said,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> is <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that there should be to <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> <S%H6485>lacking<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel?<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass on the <S%H4279>morrow,<s%> that the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7925>rose<s%> <S%H7925>early,<s%> and <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> an <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H5927>offered<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offerings and <S%H8002>peace<s%> offerings.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> is there among <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that <S%H5927>came<s%> not up with the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD?<s%> For they had made a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7621>oath<s%> concerning him that <S%H5927>came<s%> not up to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H4709>Mizpeh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> He shall surely be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5162>repented<s%> them for <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> their <S%H251>brother,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> There is <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> <S%H1438>cut<s%> off from <S%H3478>Israel<s%> this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H4100>How<s%> shall we <S%H6213>do<s%> for <S%H802>wives<s%> for them that <S%H3498>remain,<s%> seeing we have <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that we will not <S%H5414>give<s%> them of our <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to <S%H802>wives?<s%>

And they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>What<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> is there of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that <S%H5927>came<s%> not up to <S%H4709>Mizpeh<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD?<s%> And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> <S%H376><s%> to the <S%H4264>camp<s%> from <S%H3003>Jabeshgilead<s%> <S%H1568><s%> to the <S%H6951>assembly.<s%>

For the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H6485>numbered,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there were <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H376><s%> of the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3003>Jabeshgilead<s%> <S%H1568><s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H8033>thither<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of the most <S%H1121>valiant,<s%> <S%H2428><s%> and <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3212>Go<s%> and <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3003>Jabeshgilead<s%> <S%H1568><s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> with the <S%H802>women<s%> and the <S%H2945>children.<s%>

And <S%H2063>this<s%> is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> that you shall <S%H6213>do,<s%> You shall utterly <S%H2763>destroy<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2145>male,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> that has <S%H3045>lain<s%> <S%H4904><s%> by <S%H2145>man.<s%>

And they <S%H4672>found<s%> among the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3003>Jabeshgilead<s%> <S%H1568><s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H5291>young<s%> <S%H1330>virgins,<s%> that had <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> by <S%H4904>lying<s%> with any <S%H2145>male:<s%> and they <S%H935>brought<s%> them to the <S%H4264>camp<s%> to <S%H7887>Shiloh,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>

And the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> some to <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> that were in the <S%H5553>rock<s%> <S%H7417>Rimmon,<s%> and to <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H7965>peaceably<s%> to them.

And <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> <S%H7725>came<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> at that <S%H6256>time;<s%> and they <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H802>wives<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they had <S%H2421>saved<s%> <S%H2421>alive<s%> of the <S%H802>women<s%> of <S%H3003>Jabeshgilead:<s%> <S%H1568><s%> and yet <S%H3651>so<s%> they <S%H4672>sufficed<s%> them not.

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5162>repented<s%> them for <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H6556>breach<s%> in the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Then the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>How<s%> shall we <S%H6213>do<s%> for <S%H802>wives<s%> for them that <S%H3498>remain,<s%> <S%H3588>seeing<s%> the <S%H802>women<s%> are <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> out of <S%H1144>Benjamin?<s%>

And they <S%H559>said,<s%> There must be an <S%H3425>inheritance<s%> for them that be <S%H6413>escaped<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> that a <S%H7626>tribe<s%> be not <S%H4229>destroyed<s%> out of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

However, we <S%H3201>may<s%> not <S%H5414>give<s%> them <S%H802>wives<s%> of our <S%H1323>daughters:<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> have <S%H7650>sworn,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H779>Cursed<s%> be he that <S%H5414>gives<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> to <S%H1144>Benjamin.<s%>

Then they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> there is a <S%H2282>feast<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%> <S%H3117>yearly<s%> in a place <S%H834>which<s%> is on the <S%H6828>north<s%> side of <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> on the <S%H4217>east<s%> <S%H8121><s%> side of the <S%H4546>highway<s%> that <S%H5927>goes<s%> up from <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> to <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> and on the <S%H5045>south<s%> of <S%H3829>Lebonah.<s%>
Therefore they <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3212>Go<s%> and lie in <S%H693>wait<s%> in the <S%H3754>vineyards;<s%>

And <S%H7200>see,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%> <S%H3318>come<s%> out to <S%H2342>dance<s%> in <S%H4246>dances,<s%> then <S%H3318>come<s%> you out of the <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%> and <S%H2414>catch<s%> you every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H7887>Shiloh,<s%> and <S%H1980>go<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin.<s%>

And it shall be, <S%H3588>when<s%> their <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> their <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to us to <S%H7378>complain,<s%> that we will <S%H559>say<s%> to them, Be <S%H2603>favorable<s%> to them for our sakes: <S%H3588>because<s%> we <S%H3947>reserved<s%> not to each <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> in the <S%H4421>war:<s%> for you did not <S%H5414>give<s%> to them at this <S%H6256>time,<s%> that you should be <S%H816>guilty.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so,<s%> and <S%H5375>took<s%> them <S%H802>wives,<s%> according to their <S%H4557>number,<s%> of them that <S%H2342>danced,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> they <S%H1497>caught:<s%> and they <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H7725>returned<s%> to their <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> and <S%H1129>repaired<s%> the <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in them.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1980>departed<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> at that <S%H6256>time,<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H7626>tribe<s%> and to his <S%H4940>family,<s%> and they <S%H3318>went<s%> out from <S%H8033>there<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

In <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> there was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H3477>right<s%> in his own <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>
